item.description:
Enjoy a fun afternoon of games! Laugh, live, and let loose!

Come join me for lunch at 1 pm in their cafe!  You can use your $5 coupon!

We'll play games like Apples to Apples, Who Said That, Mexican Train Dominoes, Baulderdash, and more!  If you have a favorite game you like to play, feel free to bring it.

$5.00 admission fee, which includes a $5.00 coupon to be used in their Cafe that day.

Time is from 2 pm to 5 pm - Feel free to get there whenever you can.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in the event room in the back of the store.
item.why: You will laugh and have a great time!
item.name: Fun and Games at Tatnuck
